text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/fa79be6b10e1d34fd697a56e85f6c0ce101f3d62|patch 8.2.1784: commits are not scanned for security problems>
patch 8.2.1784: commits are not scanned for security problems

Problem:    commits are not scanned for security problems
Solution:   Enable Github code scanning. (Christian Brabandt, closes #7057)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1784: commits are not scanned for security problems · vim/vim@fa79be6
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1784: commits are not scanned for security problems · vim/vim@fa79be6
attachments.text: Problem: commits are not scanned for security problems Solution: Enable Github code scanning. (Christian Brabandt, closes #7057)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/bdf931c25b4fe78877106ca529baee7899d0f6a4|patch 8.2.1783: try-catch test fails>
patch 8.2.1783: try-catch test fails

Problem:    Try-catch test fails.
Solution:   Don't call win_enter(), only call enterering_window().

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1783: try-catch test fails · vim/vim@bdf931c
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1783: try-catch test fails · vim/vim@bdf931c
attachments.text: Problem: Try-catch test fails. Solution: Don't call win_enter(), only call enterering_window().

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/74273e66914e46eb5814c13a1b888e45358859b6|patch 8.2.1782: Vim9: cannot pass boolean to mapset()>
patch 8.2.1782: Vim9: cannot pass boolean to mapset()

Problem:    Vim9: cannot pass boolean to mapset().
Solution:   Use get_tv_bool(). (closes #7041)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1782: Vim9: cannot pass boolean to mapset() · vim/vim@74273e6
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1782: Vim9: cannot pass boolean to mapset() · vim/vim@74273e6
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: cannot pass boolean to mapset(). Solution: Use get_tv_bool(). (closes #7041)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/4537bcc88956f86267c25edf8008e0dbde598652|patch 8.2.1781: writing to prompt buffer interferes with insert mode>
patch 8.2.1781: writing to prompt buffer interferes with insert mode

Problem:    Writing to prompt buffer interferes with insert mode.
Solution:   Use win_enter() instead of just setting "curwin". (Ben Jackson,
            closes #7035)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1781: writing to prompt buffer interferes with insert mode · vim/vim@4537bcc
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1781: writing to prompt buffer interferes with insert mode · vim/vim@4537bcc
attachments.text: Problem: Writing to prompt buffer interferes with insert mode. Solution: Use win_enter() instead of just setting "curwin". (Ben Jackson, closes #7035)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/668008be66326ed9e5b1122abede34ed3d2de2d8|patch 8.2.1780: statusline not updated when splitting windows>
patch 8.2.1780: statusline not updated when splitting windows

Problem:    Statusline not updated when splitting windows.
Solution:   Call status_redraw_all(). (Jason Franklin, closes #5496)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1780: statusline not updated when splitting windows · vim/vim@668008b
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1780: statusline not updated when splitting windows · vim/vim@668008b
attachments.text: Problem: Statusline not updated when splitting windows. Solution: Call status_redraw_all(). (Jason Franklin, closes #5496)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/0022675aa362da0969666e48ced252b57ca1f79e|patch 8.2.1779: some debian changelog files are not recognized>
patch 8.2.1779: some debian changelog files are not recognized

Problem:    Some debian changelog files are not recognized.
Solution:   Add */debian/changelog. (Jason Franklin)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1779: some debian changelog files are not recognized · vim/vim@0022675
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1779: some debian changelog files are not recognized · vim/vim@0022675
attachments.text: Problem: Some debian changelog files are not recognized. Solution: Add */debian/changelog. (Jason Franklin)
